snippet: The uniform Bill Mazeroski wore when he hit the winning home run in the 1960 World Series sold for $632,500 at an auction.
abstract: Bill Mazeroski's Pittsburgh Pirates uniform that he wore when he hit the home run to win the 1960 World Series sells for $632,500 through Hunt Auctions at the Louisville Slugger Museum & Factory in Kentucky.
lead_paragraph: The uniform Bill Mazeroski wore when he hit the winning home run in the 1960 World Series sold for $632,500 at an auction.

headline.main: Priceless Moment for Pirates, but $632,500 for the Uniform
headline.print_headline: Priceless Moment for Pirates, But $632,500 for the Uniform
